summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PIVOT accessibility platform. Backend APIs are highly functional (94.7% success rate) with excellent authentication, CRUD operations, file uploads, and TTS generation. Frontend flows work well for core features but have modal interaction issues preventing file upload testing.

minor_bugs.issue: Initially expected JSON but requires form data - fixed during testing
minor_bugs.impact: TTS generation API works correctly with proper form data

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocking interactions - buttons not clickable
ui_bugs.selector: Upload Video/Audio buttons in section detail
ui_bugs.details: Modal backdrop intercepts pointer events preventing file upload dialog interactions

accessibility_issues.details: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent

passed_tests: Backend API comprehensive test suite (18/19 endpoints)

high_priority: Fix modal overlay issues preventing file upload interactions in section detail page
Add proper aria-describedby attributes to DialogContent components for accessibility compliance
medium_priority: Test actual file uploads with real files once modal issues are resolved
Verify TTS generation UI flow after modal fixes

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core flows working, file upload UI blocked)
